title: Are these shoes from Zudio casual or sports shoes?
selftext:
Need help figuring out if these shoes are sports or casual?
Shoe 1: https://ibb.co/C5X4q01
Shoe 2: https://ibb.co/KLZ4SyB
comments: If you don't mind stating, which looks better?
casual shoes looks better go for it
They are cheap plastic shoes which you should not wear in hot temperatures as it affects the nervous system
